name: Kick The Bucket
description:
INSTRUCTIONS ! Click (or tap) the bucket and drag away from it to wind up a kick. Release to launch!

Note 1: If full screen mode is not working correctly on desktop, right click and select "reload frame".

Note 2: For the time being, mobile devices are not supported. The game works on mobile, but the menu button that starts the game does not. Rip.

Source code is available here: https://editor.p5js.org/SamyBencherif/sketches/NKU7Lneqo
